entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miscou Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miscou Island 12:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Blowing snow along parts of the coast overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
